posts.post_content:
Cool postcard from the all-time winningest Cubs team.  Lettering, pennant borders and date are embossed and glittery (similar to a wedding invitation).
Foxing along the top and right sides (appears lighter in person) and a light crease in the lower left corner. 

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=633&pictureid=20738[/IMG][IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=633&pictureid=20739[/IMG]
Asking $165 delivered.  Paypal FF.
